House Lifting Services

Safe, efficient, and cost-effective solutions to raise your home above road level.

Home > House Lifting

Why Lift Your House?

Over time, road levels increase due to re-laying, causing older houses to go below street level. This leads to severe waterlogging during rains and sewage backflow issues.

Instead of demolishing and rebuilding, which is expensive and time-consuming, House Lifting is a smart alternative. We use advanced jack technology to lift your entire structure safely to the desired height, preserving your home and saving you money.

Benefits of Lifting

Cost Effective

Saves up to 70% of the cost compared to demolition and reconstruction.

Time Saving

Project completion in weeks rather than the months/years needed for rebuilding.

Flood Protection

Permanently solves waterlogging issues by raising the floor level.

Structural Safety

We strengthen the foundation during the process, extending building life.

No Damage

Advanced synchronization ensures the house is lifted evenly without cracks.

Legal Compliance

We handle necessary permissions and ensure compliance with regulations.

Frequently Asked Questions

Is house lifting safe? ▼
Yes, when done by experts. We use synchronized jacks and steel supports to ensure the structural integrity of your building is maintained throughout the process.
How much height can be raised? ▼
We can typically raise a house anywhere from 1 foot to 6 feet or more, depending on your requirements and the site conditions.
Do we need to vacate the house? ▼
Yes, for safety reasons, it is recommended to vacate the house during the lifting process. Utilities like water and electricity will need to be disconnected.

Solve Waterlogging Today
